name: Out of the Window
description:
Description

A 2D platformer with some unusual mechanics. It can render outside of your window.

Controls

  • S - move left
  • D - move right
  • Space - jump
  • Mouse - move your window

Requirements

Game works best on 1920x1080 resolution. It may not render properly, please report such cases to me.

Assets used

I used some assets from https://opengameart.org/
